posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
Taking 3 monk levels at 27 thru 29 will add the following to the pure build:
+3 Tumble AC (w/Tumble@30)
Max Discipline 32(36) - Anti KD/disarm/called shots
Evasion
Cleave
Access to monk boots & robes

Without armor/shield, a monk 3 would get +6 AC from WIS, +10% move speed & monk attack progression with monk weapons. These benefits would be realized with a DEX version of this build but with the waraxe prereq, it is not feasible, so I steer away from DEX/kama.

What is lost is:
-3 to break thru spell resistance (this build is not focused to break SR anyway)

All cleric buffs remain indispellable at Cleric 27/Monk 3 and everything else in the build guide remains the same except for the skill allocation.

This is just the first example that came to mind but it should illustrate why a MC build will almost always be superior to a pure build in some regards. It's called "synergy". If you need the specifics of the revised version, I can PM you the details since it won't be a pure build anymore.
